recipes.title: How to make French Toast
recipes.instructions: Method1. Mix the egg and milk and give a nice stir. Add sugar to this and again give a nice stir.2. Cut the bread in to triangle (or what ever shape you like) and soak it in the egg-milk mixture just 2 seconds on each side. (Do not soak more than that, as you will get more eggy smell or the bread becomes more mushy).3. Before soaking the bread, heat the tawa and add little butter. When it is hot, add the soaked bread.4. Flip the bread on the other side and serve hot with any tomato sauce.5. Yummy and easy French Toast is ready....Yummy and Easy French Toast is ready...

steps.step: Mix the egg and milk and give a nice stir.
Add sugar to this and again give a nice stir.2.

Cut the bread in to triangle (or what ever shape you like) and soak it in the egg-milk mixture just 2 seconds on each side. (Do not soak more than that, as you will get more eggy smell or the bread becomes more mushy).3. Before soaking the bread, heat the tawa and add little butter. When it is hot, add the soaked bread.4. Flip the bread on the other side and serve hot with any tomato sauce.5. Yummy and easy French Toast is ready....Yummy and Easy French Toast is ready...
